name: Bien-Aimé Baraza
description:
'''Bien-Aimé Alusa Baraza''' (born 28 December 1987), known professionally as '''Bien''', is a Kenyan singer, songwriter, and guitarist. He is a member of the acclaimed Kenyan Afropop band [[Sauti Sol]].

As a solo artist, Bien has achieved commercial success with his debut album ''Alusa Why Are You Topless?'' and is a co-founder of the record label [[Sol Generation Records]]. He is also a Grammy-certified songwriter for his contribution to the [[Burna Boy]] album ''[[Twice as Tall]]''.
